column5: Well there was a lot of fish caught this weekend on my boat and on a Slowpokes but today the wife and I put a whoopin on the eyes until we ran out of crawlers.  We were fishing LSC in 14fow using harnesses copper with crawlers we were off the water before 9:30 with these 9 also lost a few and had many sheep, silvers,perch, SM and a LM to round the day.  I hope everyone else had a great long weekend I know we did with family friends and fireworks last night and a early day fishing before the heat it sure did round out a great week.
nice spread.  Thats gonna make for a tasty holiday monday supper
Wow nice haul there Mike!

Wow...nice multi-species day there Mike...looks like summer there too!!!!  And if thats you in the second pic holding up the fish, i have finally made the connection between the lures you make and handlebarz!
Wow, nice haul Mike, congrats
Thats some nice tastey treats there Mike. WTG.
Nice fish Mike.  Nice day out there eh.
So many great reports this weekend - lets hope it's a sign for the summer to be!  Thanks Mike
Got to love it when the time to go has to be when you run out of crawlers Awesome report Mike
WTG Mike !!!.... Looks like a great day on the water !!!!!!!
Nice fish Mikey hope Tom McCutcheon doesnt see them or he might want a donation for the friday night K Lakes outing
Thanks everyone it was a fun morning. As for Tom I will gladly donate these 5 bags of eyes and perch for one of his prime rib dinners.
X2, It was like this at this time last year too.  Nice stringer of fish. Good size too.

Well done Mike & Danna!! Same spot as yesterday? Rolly and I had a good time but the fish couldn't find us too easily! Okay, we went 2/3 with the 'bow going towards the block party BBQ tonight. I tried some, still don't like it! Is Danna available for any walleye derby's?
Awesome day out you two!!
Yep she is just remember she catches the small fish
Great morning on the water for you both!
That's a great day.  I might have to alter my post in the retirement thread!
Juli wants to know where your Team 10 sign was
Tell her it's on the way to Chris dead fish count

I was telling Brian I should have taken a pic of a 19 1/2" SM I got yes I measured it when I was taking the hook out my tape is on my back deck and makes for a good place to lay a fish down I hope to get some big cats again my bad on not taking pics of the last ones but we will get bigger ones
Great work, Mike! I really tried on the weekend, but only managed to get the walleye's midnight snack!!
